text: Rodney E. Anfenson (June 29, 1929 – April 13, 2001) was an American football, basketball, and track coach. He served as the head football coach at St. Cloud State University from 1965 to 1971, compiling a record of 27–32–4. ==Head coaching record== ===College football=== ==References== ==External links== * Bemidji State Hall of Fame profile * St. Cloud State Hall of Fame profile * Category:1929 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Bemidji State Beavers football players Category:Bemidji State Beavers men's basketball players Category:St. Cloud State Huskies athletic directors Category:St. Cloud State Huskies football coaches Category:St. Cloud State Huskies men's basketball coaches Category:College track and field coaches in the United States Category:High school football coaches in Minnesota Category:People from Faribault, Minnesota Category:Players of American football from Minnesota Category:Basketball players from Minnesota Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball coaches from Minnesota
title: Rod Anfenson
